name: Pass to Hell
description:
Pass to Hell is a game where your choices lead to consequences. You will become Death and you will decide who is worthy to go to Heaven and who is to Hell.
There is a struggle for power in Hell and you will have the opportunity to influence this event.
Your fate is in your hands, and it is up to you to decide how your story ends.

You will have the choice to send the person to heaven or hell.
You can help revolutionaries.
Make an informed decision.
Help the souls of people.

This game is in the genre of puzzle and "Point and Click". You have to study the souls carefully to make an informed decision. Feel like a Judge who has studied the entire history of a person makes a decision. Your decisions affect not only the souls of people, but also you.
The consequences of the decisions you make will catch up with you sooner than you think.
